meanings.definition: Make (something) simpler or easier to do or understand.
meanings.sent2: She simplifies the math problems for her students.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to simplify cooking by using only a microwave was a disaster.
meanings.sent4: The new software simplifies data analysis to just a few clicks.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's explanation simplifies complex ideas into easy concepts.

meanings.sent1: The summary simplifies the main points of the story.
meanings.sent2: He simplifies his wardrobe to just a few key pieces.
meanings.sent3: Trying to simplify a novel into a tweet is quite a challenge.
meanings.sent4: Her smile simplifies all the worries in the world.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brushstroke simplifies the scene to its essence.
